name: 199X (itch)
description:
199X is a lightly interactive adventure game, made in the RPG Maker engine. It is a 2-3 hour narrative experience. You control Clara, a girl who woke up one day feeling controlled. It is imperative that you restore her independence, through any means necessary. She'd do it herself, if she could.

Play 199X. Help you help herself.

http://www.agamewithoutmechanics.com/
